sectionHeading: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Bolivar St

location: Effective Wednesday April 29.  Duration approximately one week.
Bolivar St CLOSED between S Upper St and S Mill St (in direction toward Broadway).  Note that Bolivar St will remain closed from Broadway to Upper.
Broadway will continue to be one way between Mill St and Broadway.
Motorists may use Cedar St between Broadway and Upper.
Please see the map for traffic patterns.
